LanguageData.GerzeeNeedFood.stages.0.label: getting hungry
LanguageData.GerzeeNeedFood.stages.0.description: I'll need a snack at some point.
LanguageData.GerzeeNeedFood.stages.1.label: hungry
LanguageData.GerzeeNeedFood.stages.2.label: empty stomach
LanguageData.GerzeeNeedFood.stages.2.description: Okay, I really do need food now.
LanguageData.GerzeeNeedFood.stages.3.label: malnourished
LanguageData.GerzeeNeedFood.stages.3.description: I really need some food now.
LanguageData.GerzeeNeedFood.stages.4.label: starving
LanguageData.GerzeeNeedFood.stages.4.description: I can barely think about anything but food. My skin is stretching over my bones. Am I going to die?
LanguageData.GerzeeNeedFood.stages.5.label: advanced starvation
LanguageData.GerzeeNeedFood.stages.5.description: I can barely move or think about anything but food. My stomach hurts like never before. I feel like I'm going to pass out.
LanguageData.GerzeeNeedFood.stages.6.label: extreme starvation
LanguageData.GerzeeNeedRoomSize.stages.0.label: confined interior
LanguageData.GerzeeNeedRoomSize.stages.0.description: This space is so tiny. I feel very hidden and safe.
LanguageData.GerzeeNeedRoomSize.stages.1.label: cramped interior
LanguageData.GerzeeNeedRoomSize.stages.1.description: This room is small. I feel safe being able to see everything.
LanguageData.GerzeeNeedRoomSize.stages.2.label: spacious interior
LanguageData.GerzeeNeedRoomSize.stages.2.description: This room is so expansive. That's okay, I guess.
